results.name: McKay-Thompson series of class 2A for the Monster group.
reference: T. Gannon, Moonshine Beyond the Monster, Cambridge, 2006; see p. 423.
link: Seiichi Manyama, Table of n, a(n) for n = -1..10000
R. E. Borcherds, Review of "Moonshine Beyond the Monster ..." (Cambridge, 2006), Bull. Amer. Math. Soc., 45 (2008), 675-679.
D. Ford, J. McKay and S. P. Norton, More on replicable functions, Commun. Algebra 22, No. 13, 5175-5193 (1994).

N. Heninger, E. M. Rains and N. J. A. Sloane, On the Integrality of n-th Roots of Generating Functions, arXiv:math/0509316 [math.NT], 2005-2006; J. Combinatorial Theory, Series A, 113 (2006), 1732-1745.
Index entries for McKay-Thompson series for Monster simple group
mathematica: eta[q_]:= q^(1/24)*QPochhammer[q]; f2A:= (eta[q]/eta[q^2])^24*(1 + 64*( eta[q^2]/eta[q])^24)^2; a:= CoefficientList[Series[q*(f2A - 104), {q, 0, 50}], q]; Table[a[[n]], {n,1,50}] (* _G. C. Greubel_, May 10 2018 *)
xref: A045478, A007241, A106207, A007267, A101558 are all essentially the same sequence.
Cf. A007241 (same except for 0th term), A007267, A045478.
results.author: _Michael Somos_, Dec 06 2004
